The Garden

I find ability to share the ideas being in development beautiful and empowering. For my digital garden in its current state, I was inspired by and shamelessly copied Maggie Apleton's metaphor:

  • ğŸŒ± Seedling: Early explorations, raw thoughts
  • ğŸŒ¿ Growing: Somewhat developed, might have major iterations to come
  • â‡ï¸ Evergreen: Mostly finished, at most minor iterations to come
